DIA_Lutz_SQ410_Cutscene_03_01: Viktor! I hear you have a problem with me! Then I'm listening! Say what's on your mind.
DIA_Viktor_SQ410_Cutscene_03_02: Looking for trouble, Lutz? If you want, I will trouble you!
DIA_Lutz_SQ410_Cutscene_03_03: Go ahead! I haven't beaten a stable boy in a long time. Maybe I still remember how to do it.
DIA_Viktor_SQ410_Cutscene_03_04: I've had enough of you! You'll regret this, you bastard!
